I made this search, based in the   
P22 Bayer Universal, on Myfonts   
"MoreFontsLikeThis"   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/bayer-universal/morelikethis.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194420/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/p22/bayer-universal/morelikethis.html)   
   
WOW... 209 pages of results... ;D

There is [Architype Bayer](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194420/http:/www.on-idle.com/foundry/foundry_architype_1/bayer.html) from [The Foundry](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194420/http:/thefoundrystudio.co.uk/).   
They also digitized his [1931](http://web.archive.org/web/20070911194420/http:/www.on-idle.com/foundry/foundry_architype_2/bayer_type.html) design.
